name: Gems!!!
description:
Hello and Welcome!

This is not a match 3 game! When you click on one gem, every gem of the same color conected will be collected. You need to collect a certain amount with just 20 clicks.

This is my first try to make such kind of game. Hope you like it.

The sprites were made by Free Game Assets (https://free-game-assets.itch.io/).

The music was made by Tallbeard Studios (https://tallbeard.itch.io/music-loop-bundle).

Have fun playing this game.
